relation: Categories
Great for these types of students
Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
Bang for the buck
What to do for fun
Food and Dining
Dorm Life
Academic Rigor
Tips for prospective students
In three sentences
Comments

The safety of the BCC campus is very qualified. You can always look for an emergency button if needed. The campus staff walks around and there's also a safety station you can approach should you need assistance.

The Finance Club, along with others club, will help you interact with people of all ages and walks of life. You will learn more about business, investing, and complete projects that'll help you with management later on in life, whether it be a money-related project or a simple life task.

Believe it or not, the vending machines are the best thing you can look forward to during break. When my professors say we can for a 5 minute break, I always find a good snack to fill my break time and keep me satisfied.

You can sign up for the swimming pool or enjoy the gym. You can go to the library and read several interesting books or enjoy going on the computers in the lab. You can even sign up for the golf or soccer team and enjoy the various sports programs.
The food is truly delicious. Anywhere from sandwiches to gourmet lunches, the selection of different foods is really magnificent. The staff at the lunch room are always helpful and courteous.

Though BCC currently does not currently offer a dorm, it would certainly be enjoyable to dorm here. The diversity makes for a great atmosphere here, and I believe students would really interact well with each other.

The academic rigor is exceptional for a community school. There are several programs such as Accounting, Health, Business, Computer Graphics, Nursing and other popular programs. The curriculum is on par with large and popular universities, so the education you get is really worth your time and will improve your knowledge and academic standing.

With more than 14,000 students enrolling in some sort of educational program, BCC can be the path to your future. The school offers Associate in Arts (A.A.) and Associate in Science (A.S.) degrees. Consider a transfer program for a four year school. Take your studies seriously and you will excel. The path to your future career and employment is in your hands. Consider signing up for some online classes as well as on campus to fully experience the education at BCC.

Bergen is a state of the art school among community colleges. The environment, atmosphere, and curriculum is on par with established universities. This school offers the best transition to a four year financial institution.
pageTitle: Bergen Community College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {239961=As the 2014 Class Valedictorian, I can proudly say that attending Bergen has been the experience of my life. I decided to attend a community college, as a financially smart option, but I found something unique that changed my perspective of education: a vibrant multicultural student community. Today I can proudly say I am a BCC graduate., 259883=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 25047=BCC is one of my best choices i ever made. I am going for general classes than transfer to other school. is cheaper that way cause im only spending 1500 for all my general than spending 8000 just for my general classes in the school I want to go. other than that, the classes is the same like any other college or university. but probably i will change my major and finish in BCC. cause in my situation i can only afford for this college and the habitat is great :)}
